name: Shiranui Felsword
text: You can discard this card from your hand and target 1 "Shiranui" monster you control (Quick Effect); until the end of your opponent's next turn, it's unaffected by your opponent's card effects. If you Synchro Summon a "Shiranui" monster: You can Special Summon this card from your GY, and this card is treated as a Tuner, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only activate each effect of "Shiranui Felword" once per turn.
